'''Martial Artist's Bandana''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Martial Artist]].

==Description==
A bright-red bandana that belonged to a martial artist. The color has now faded.<br />It serves as proof that the bearer practiced martial arts at a young age. It also represents the high ambition the young martial artist once had.<br />Before the first crack of dawn, the young martial artist was already training in the forest.<br />Many years later, the martial artist is now an instructor. Though youth may be a thing of his past, he remains just as alert and diligent as when he was young.
